p:
Isolates identified as CRF01_AE in this study were analyzed against all whole-genome CRF01_AE sequences in the Los Alamos National Laboratory (LANL) HIV-1 sequence database ( n = 382; accessed October 2018). First, we re-subtyped these reference sequences with REGA v3.0 (Ref.
26 ) and jpHMM
27 to insure the correct subtype assignment. Sequences presenting classification discrepancies from the Genbank information were excluded from the dataset ( n = 11).
